channel.title: Distributed Future Podcast
channel.description: In this podcast we interview interesting people who are doing new things in tech that may give us some insight into future society.
channel.copyright: Copyright (C) 2018 The contributors, all rights reserved
channel.itunes:author: Distributed Future Podcast

item.title: New Browser, Who dis ?
item.description: Building a new browser. We talk about the browser landscape, why it is important and how to make a new one.

media:content.media:title: New Browser, Who dis ?
media:content.media:description: Building a new browser. We talk about the browser landscape, why it is important and how to make a new one.

item.title: The speed of news media and our ability to respond
item.description: We talk about the speed of the news cycle, how little we can change and the rate of change now and in the future.

media:content.media:title: The speed of news media and our ability to respond
media:content.media:description: We talk about the speed of the news cycle, how little we can change and the rate of change now and in the future.

item.title: Saffron: a case for modern farming?
item.description: We talk about farming a high value crop in new way - our guests are farming saffron Cheshire.

media:content.media:title: Saffron: a case for modern farming?
media:content.media:description: We talk about farming a high value crop in new way - our guests are farming saffron Cheshire.

item.title: The future of open source software
item.description: Who contributes to opensource? What are their motivations? How will cloud computing change the picture? We talked with a creator of a successful open source project to find some answers.

media:content.media:title: The future of open source software
media:content.media:description: Who contributes to opensource? What are their motivations? How will cloud computing change the picture? We talked with a creator of a successful open source project to find some answers.

item.title: Digital humans and identity
item.description: How do you prove your identity online? How do we know you are real?

media:content.media:title: Digital humans and identity
media:content.media:description: How do you prove your identity online? How do we know you are real?

item.title: Politics, data and privacy
item.description: How is data used in politics? How should it be used?

media:content.media:title: Politics, data and privacy
media:content.media:description: How is data used in politics? How should it be used?

item.title: Intra-African travel,with beer, culture and laughter
item.description: What does the future of intra-African tourism look like? "More than the big 5" says our guest, we talk about tech, beer, food, ferries etc. (CW - lots of laughter)

media:content.media:title: Intra-African travel,with beer, culture and laughter
media:content.media:description: What does the future of intra-African tourism look like? "More than the big 5" says our guest, we talk about tech, beer, food, ferries etc. (CW - lots of laughter)

item.title: 2020 Roundup
item.description: A roundup of the year on the podcast and a look at the future

media:content.media:title: 2020 Roundup
media:content.media:description: A roundup of the year on the podcast and a look at the future

item.title: The future of internet social media platforms
item.description: We talk about the past present and future of social media platforms, content moderation vs censorship and the responsibilites of individuals.

media:content.media:title: The future of internet social media platforms
media:content.media:description: We talk about the past present and future of social media platforms, content moderation vs censorship and the responsibilites of individuals.

item.title: The future of (local) politics.
item.description: What will (local) politics look like in the future? We talked to a young politican about how she sees the future of power (both sorts), transport and media. CW: We discuss the law on rape in this episode.

media:content.media:title: The future of (local) politics.
media:content.media:description: What will (local) politics look like in the future? We talked to a young politican about how she sees the future of power (both sorts), transport and media. CW: We discuss the law on rape in this episode.
media:content.media:keywords: Future, tech, politics, nuclear power, social media

item.title: Responsible standards
item.description: A discussion about practical tech ethics. Tim describes a potential issue in a draft standard and Vim tells him to act on it.

media:content.media:title: Responsible standards
media:content.media:description: A discussion about practical tech ethics. Tim describes a potential issue in a draft standard and Vim tells him to act on it.

item.title: Internet standards and concensus making
item.description: How are internet standards made? Do they define our future? What is the IETF? Our guest answers these questions and more!

media:content.media:title: Internet standards and concensus making
media:content.media:description: How are internet standards made? Do they define our future? What is the IETF? Our guest answers these questions and more!

item.title: Thoughts on AI in Black History Month
item.description: How does AI become biased, how can we change this. Tim and Vim try and see what the future might hold.

media:content.media:title: Thoughts on AI in Black History Month
media:content.media:description: How does AI become biased, how can we change this. Tim and Vim try and see what the future might hold.

item.title: News and Media trends in New Zeeland.
item.description: What's new in Media New Zeeland? Can you run a site ad-free? Our guest answers these questions and more...

media:content.media:title: News and Media trends in New Zeeland.
media:content.media:description: What's new in Media New Zeeland? Can you run a site ad-free? Our guest answers these questions and more...

item.title: The future as seen by a Pan-African challenger bank.
item.description: We discuss what fintech looks like in Zambia, how to find and educate your market with SMS, the power of radio, the growth of internet in Africa and much much more.

media:content.media:title: The future as seen by a Pan-African challenger bank.
media:content.media:description: We discuss what fintech looks like in Zambia, how to find and educate your market with SMS, the power of radio, the growth of internet in Africa and much much more.

item.title: The Internet in Malawi
item.description: We discuss the current state of the Internet in Africa, concentrationg on Malawi. The future is dependent on a mix of politics, business and tech.

media:content.media:title: The Internet in Malawi
media:content.media:description: We discuss the current state of the Internet in Africa, concentrationg on Malawi. The future is dependent on a mix of politics, business and tech.

item.title: Art, VR, Fashion and mental health
item.description: In a wide ranging chat we talk about how VR can be harnessed for BAME mental health, how haptics can enhance the immersiveness of illusions and much much more.

media:content.media:title: Art, VR, Fashion and mental health
media:content.media:description: In a wide ranging chat we talk about how VR can be harnessed for BAME mental health, how haptics can enhance the immersiveness of illusions and much much more.

item.title: Black Lives Matter and the future of social change
item.description: We take a moment to reflect on the state of the world. The pandemic and technology are causing a huge shift in our way of living and working. We also see huge shifts in social movements and protests. What are our hopes for the future?

media:content.media:title: Black Lives Matter and the future of social change
media:content.media:description: We take a moment to reflect on the state of the world. The pandemic and technology are causing a huge shift in our way of living and working. We also see huge shifts in social movements and protests. What are our hopes for the future?
media:content.media:keywords: BLM, Quakers, diversity, inclusion, future, tech

item.title: How crafting intersects with social media and other technologies
item.description: Georgia casts a light on how social media platforms and other technologies are used in the world of crafting.

item.title: Using conflict resolution techniques to de-polarize social media.
item.description: How can we start to restore civility to online discourse? Vim chatswith Jabob Lefton about techniques to depolarize social media. "Regardless of how we disagree with our (physical) neighbors, we still share the street."

media:content.media:title: Using conflict resolution techniques to de-polarize social media.
media:content.media:description: How can we start to restore civility to online discourse? Vim chatswith Jabob Lefton about techniques to depolarize social media. "Regardless of how we disagree with our (physical) neighbors, we still share the street."

item.title: Influencers influencing politics and effecting social change.
item.description: An uplifting discussion about how influencers are effecting social change and will replace the current established brands.

media:content.media:title: Influencers influencing politics and effecting social change.
media:content.media:description: An uplifting discussion about how influencers are effecting social change and will replace the current established brands.

item.title: Long distance overland travel, now and in the future.
item.description: The availability of highspeed trains and internet has transformed long distance overland travel. We chat about an overland (and sea) trip from Japan to Munich and beyond.

media:content.media:title: Long distance overland travel, now and in the future.
media:content.media:description: The availability of highspeed trains and internet has transformed long distance overland travel. We chat about an overland (and sea) trip from Japan to Munich and beyond.

item.title: Future of the Corporation
item.description: We discuss the necessary paradigm shift that redefines business for the 21st century and builds trust between business and society.

media:content.media:title: Future of the Corporation
media:content.media:description: We discuss the necessary paradigm shift that redefines business for the 21st century and builds trust between business and society.

item.title: Positive action on inclusion in tech.
item.description: An optimistic view about how to tackle the challenges.

item.title: Infosec - the skills shortage.
item.description: Why is there a skills shortage in information security? We discuss toxic workplaces and an immature industry.

media:content.media:title: Infosec - the skills shortage.
media:content.media:description: Why is there a skills shortage in information security? We discuss toxic workplaces and an immature industry.

item.description: We are taking a break, normal service will be resumed in January

item.title: Organizing Matrix - how to protect and grow an ambitious project.
item.description: Matrix.org aims to be the future of communications: a secure, distributed, open layer on top of the internet. We discuss how the organizational structure of the project can help keep it true to it's goals.

media:content.media:title: Organizing Matrix - how to protect and grow an ambitious project.
media:content.media:description: Matrix.org aims to be the future of communications: a secure, distributed, open layer on top of the internet. We discuss how the organizational structure of the project can help keep it true to it's goals.

item.title: Intentional communities, tiny houses and artistic creation.
item.description: Josh describes how he's intentionally changing his local community with art, tiny houses and by encouraging creativity.

media:content.media:title: Intentional communities, tiny houses and artistic creation.
media:content.media:description: Josh describes how he's intentionally changing his local community with art, tiny houses and by encouraging creativity.

item.title: Telemedicine - the future of health care?
item.description: Telehealth allows patients to consult experts thousands of km away, we discuss how this works in rural Australia and the benefits it brings.

media:content.media:title: Telemedicine - the future of health care?
media:content.media:description: Telehealth allows patients to consult experts thousands of km away, we discuss how this works in rural Australia and the benefits it brings.

item.description: We discuss building your own satellite and sending it to space as well as amateur rocketry along with the communities and organizations that make this possible.

media:content.media:description: We discuss building your own satellite and sending it to space as well as amateur rocketry along with the communities and organizations that make this possible.

item.description: Is the future visual? How much of that is digital media? How should we educate future media creators? A chat with some answers...

media:content.media:description: Is the future visual? How much of that is digital media? How should we educate future media creators? A chat with some answers...

media:content.media:title: The future of voice and voice interfaces

item.title: Will the social enterprise model help us make better tech?
item.description: Imran talks about his hopes for 30 Chapel St, a new Arts, tech and Social Enterprise Hub in Bradford.

media:content.media:title: Will the social enterprise model help us make better tech?
media:content.media:description: Imran talks about his hopes for 30 Chapel St, a new Arts, tech and Social Enterprise Hub in Bradford.

item.description: How apps can help make farming more ecologically sustainable

item.title: The future of languages
item.description: Learning languages through apps, Esperanto and the future of English

media:content.media:title: The future of languages

item.title: New organizational structures for crisis and aid.
item.description: Willow describes best practice in aid or crisis response: "It was always about finding the people who are already doing the work and showing up and saying here are the resources I have. How can I help you? Or do you want me to go away?"

media:content.media:title: New organizational structures for crisis and aid.
media:content.media:description: Willow describes best practice in aid or crisis response: "It was always about finding the people who are already doing the work and showing up and saying here are the resources I have. How can I help you? Or do you want me to go away?"

item.title: The Riz test - questioning Muslim representation in Film and TV
item.description: The Riz test is a set of 5 questions that help film and TV makers see how they represent Muslim characters, based on crowdsourced feedback from viewers. We chat about how tech helped form and promote the test. We also discuss what impact it has and will have in the future.

media:content.media:title: The Riz test - questioning Muslim representation in Film and TV
media:content.media:description: The Riz test is a set of 5 questions that help film and TV makers see how they represent Muslim characters, based on crowdsourced feedback from viewers. We chat about how tech helped form and promote the test. We also discuss what impact it has and will have in the future.

item.title: Recycling houses, routers and bandwidth
item.description: A chat about how to reuse old houses, routers etc with the help of open source and grain legs.

media:content.media:title: Recycling houses, routers and bandwidth
media:content.media:description: A chat about how to reuse old houses, routers etc with the help of open source and grain legs.

item.title: A virtual year of Distributed Future
item.description: We have a virtual year of episodes under our belts, so this is a look at the episodes, why we do the podcast and what's next

media:content.media:title: A virtual year of Distributed Future
media:content.media:description: We have a virtual year of episodes under our belts, so this is a look at the episodes, why we do the podcast and what's next

item.title: The benefits of inclusion in the workplace
item.description: The workplace is changing, inclusive teams perform better, the old top down management styles are fading. In this chat we learn about how growing companies can benefit from these changes.

media:content.media:title: The benefits of inclusion in the workplace
media:content.media:description: The workplace is changing, inclusive teams perform better, the old top down management styles are fading. In this chat we learn about how growing companies can benefit from these changes.

item.title: Provenance and accountability for automated systems
item.description: "We've got all these new artificial intelligent machine learning algorithm systems. How can we make sure that they're accountable and we understand the process that has led to that decision making?"

media:content.media:title: Provenance and accountability for automated systems
media:content.media:description: "We've got all these new artificial intelligent machine learning algorithm systems. How can we make sure that they're accountable and we understand the process that has led to that decision making?"
media:content.media:keywords: AI, Machine learning, Law, accountability, design fiction, Turing red flag
